verses.name: Matthew 8:10
verses.text: When Jesus heard it, he marvelled, and said to them that followed, Verily I say unto you, I have not found so great faith, no, not in Israel.

verses.name: Matthew 8:11
verses.text: And I say unto you, That many shall come from the east and west, and shall sit down with Abraham, and Isaac, and Jacob, in the kingdom of heaven.

verses.name: Matthew 8:12
verses.text: But the children of the kingdom shall be cast out into outer darkness: there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth.
